channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: The deal, which is set to close on 22 January, would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations over national security concerns. #TikTok #Ban #ByteDance #US #BBCNews
item.description: The deal, which is set to close on 22 January, would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations over national security concerns. #TikTok #Ban #ByteDance #US #BBCNews

item.title: Those involved in hunger strikes have been charged with alleged break-ins or criminal damage linked to Palestine Action, charges that are denied, before the group was banned under terrorism legislation. #BBCNews
item.description: Those involved in hunger strikes have been charged with alleged break-ins or criminal damage linked to Palestine Action, charges that are denied, before the group was banned under terrorism legislation. #BBCNews

item.title: Rockstar North said it was incorrect to suggest the dismissals were linked to union membership or activities and said it took action after staff discussed confidential information, including specific game features from upcoming titles, in a public forum.
item.description: Rockstar North said it was incorrect to suggest the dismissals were linked to union membership or activities and said it took action after staff discussed confidential information, including specific game features from upcoming titles, in a public forum.

item.title: From March, banks and card providers will be given the power to set a maximum - or unlimited - single payment amount without the need to enter a four-digit PIN. #Contactless #Payment #News #BBCNews

item.title: The US justice department has released some of the long-awaited files related to its investigations into the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. #US #Epstein #Politics #USNews #BBCNews
item.description: The US justice department has released some of the long-awaited files related to its investigations into the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. #US #Epstein #Politics #USNews #BBCNews

item.title: The US Justice Department has released some of the so-called Epstein files, which include images of well-known figures. Being named or pictured in the files does not imply wrongdoing, and many previously identified have denied any wrongdoing. #Epstein #E
item.description: The US Justice Department has released some of the so-called Epstein files, which include images of well-known figures. Being named or pictured in the files does not imply wrongdoing, and many previously identified have denied any wrongdoing.  #Epstein #E

item.title: The files contain photos of the interiors of Epstein's homes, his overseas travels and celebrities including US President Bill Clinton, Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor and Michael Jackson. #Epstein #EpsteinFiles #MickJagger #MichaelJackson #BBCNews
item.description: The files contain photos of the interiors of Epstein's homes, his overseas travels and celebrities including US President Bill Clinton, Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor and Michael Jackson. #Epstein #EpsteinFiles #MickJagger #MichaelJackson #BBCNews

item.title: Sky Roberts said his sister Virginia Giuffre would be feeling "a lot of mixed emotions" about the latest release of the Epstein files. #VirginiaGiuffre #Epstein #EpsteinFiles #US #BBCNews
item.description: Sky Roberts said his sister Virginia Giuffre would be feeling "a lot of mixed emotions" about the latest release of the Epstein files. #VirginiaGiuffre #Epstein #EpsteinFiles #US #BBCNews

item.title: The Epstein files include footage recorded by the Palm Beach Police Department during a 2005 house search, which was first released in 2019. #Epstein #EpsteinFiles #PalmBeach #US #BBCNews
item.description: The Epstein files include footage recorded by the Palm Beach Police Department during a 2005 house search, which was first released in 2019. #Epstein #EpsteinFiles #PalmBeach #US #BBCNews
